Posts.EditableText: You could always "cheat". Create two canteens: one empty, one full. When you fill the empty canteen, take it away from the player and give him the full one. Likewise, when you empty the full canteen, take it away and give him the empty one.
Posts.HTML:
You could always "cheat".

Create two canteens: one empty, one full. When you fill the empty canteen, take it away from the player and give him the full one. Likewise, when you empty the full canteen, take it away and give him the empty one.

use Al's typelib library and make the canteen a container.  Create an object that's unavaliable called water that's containable.  Then use a custom command called fill canteen.  Then reveal the water object and put it in the canteen.

I'm not sure if this would work having never really used Al's typelib library(I haven't needed it) but from what I have read it should work
